attributes.action: Sentence all the Rioters that brought shame to this country to 5 years in prison
attributes.additional_details:
The riots of august 2011 brought shame to this country, there was no purpose behind any of this that happened these criminals just wanted to course harm, they broke the law and they should be punished

Personally i think they should get more than 5 years but seen as most of them where youths maybe 5 years will straighten them out and the might just might become decent members of society. as for the over croudedness ship them out to other countries that have spaces in there prisons. that might teach them the difference between right and wrong
